title: StanBio Connect 2025
text:
StanBio is a one-day online conference that will take place on Friday, 30 May 2025 from 9 am to 4 pm ET. We are interested in broad applictions of Stan in biomedicine including drug discovory and development, medical devices, health economics, real-world evidence, and decision-making under uncertainty. If you are developing Stan models and want to show off your work, we hope you would consider submitting an anstract.
To reserve your spot, please register here.

title: StanBio Connect 2025
text:
Program
We are contacting potential speakers and working on the program and schedule. If you have any questions, please send an email to eric dot novik at nyu.edu.

title: StanBio Connect 2025
text:
Organizers

Eric Novik, Generable and NYU Steinhardt

Vianey Leos Barajas, University of Toronto

title: StanBio Connect 2025
text:
Sponsors
StanBio is a non-profit conference organized by volunteers. If you are interested in suppporting the conference and the Stan ecosystem, please consider sponsoring this event. The funds will go directly to Stan via NumFocus.
